rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0001
rows.name:
You know that pair of Blades
who were working as dirty
Core Crystal hunters?

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0002
rows.name:
I heard they've been taken in
by new Drivers and are using
their powers for good now.

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0003
rows.name:
If they're not evil any more,
I'd kind of like to meet them.

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0004
rows.name:
Just to see what kind of Blades
were causing my bro and the Military
Engineer Corps so much grief!

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm...sorry for running
my mouth off like that.

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0007
rows.name:
You do seem like good people
now. I can feel an air of
honesty around you.

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0008
rows.name:
I guess it's true that Blades are
strongly affected by their Drivers.

rows.label: tlk45300021_06_msg0009
rows.name:
You two should count yourselves
lucky to have found such good
Drivers this time around!
